name: Unreal Engine Map File
summary: A UMAP file is an Unreal Engine map created for games developed with the Unreal Engine, a free gaming engine used to develop games such as BioShock, Mass Effect, and Unreal Tournament 3. It contains references to map properties that are stored in the .UPK Unreal Package such as objects, light brightness and direction, fog density and color, and shadow colors.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
